Reviews.Content: This device works just fine for recording studio and live shows with phone , iPad ,iPod and video projector, I own 4 of these units

Reviews.Title: Handy A/V item
Reviews.Author: Tech Guy
Reviews.Content: I have purchased several of these because I can control the left and right channels for inputs that have a split track and can control them separately.Then it gives me a mono, balanced output so I don't burn a bunch of channels in the sound board.I also use it when I have a single powered speaker that I'm feeding from a music source.It gives me a handy volume control without having to run to the speaker or try to mess with the volume control on the music device.It's the right tool for the job in many cases.

Reviews.Title: Great for connecting devices for split-track accompaniment
Reviews.Author: Lowell and Kimberley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this device for my church.  We don't have any techs available for the choir rehearsal, but they wanted to play their backing tracks through the stage monitors.  With this device, they can connect a player and control the volume from the choir loft.  This is exactly the functionality they needed.  As a bonus, the separate right/left controls allow them to use split-track accompaniment with no additional issues.
